statements: SELECT * FROM security_configurations WHERE device_type = 'Router';
SELECT device_name, software_version FROM security_configurations WHERE security_protocol = 'WPA2';
SELECT id, device_name, device_type FROM security_configurations WHERE software_version LIKE '%10';
SELECT * FROM security_configurations ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT device_name, security_protocol FROM security_configurations WHERE device_type = 'Firewall' AND software_version = 'v3.0';
SELECT * FROM security_configurations WHERE device_type = 'Router' AND software_version LIKE '%1.0%'
SELECT id, device_name FROM security_configurations WHERE security_protocol = 'WPA2'
SELECT device_name, security_protocol FROM security_configurations WHERE device_type = 'Firewall' ORDER BY device_name ASC
SELECT * FROM security_configurations WHERE device_name = 'Server' AND security_protocol = 'WPA3-Enterprise'
SELECT COUNT(id) AS total_devices FROM security_configurations WHERE security_protocol = 'WPA3'
SELECT * FROM security_configurations;
SELECT id, device_name, security_level, last_update FROM security_configurations ORDER BY device_name ASC;
SELECT device_type, security_level FROM security_configurations WHERE security_level > 5;
SELECT * FROM application_settings WHERE setting_value IS NOT NULL;
SELECT app_name, app_type, last_modified FROM application_settings ORDER BY last_modified DESC;
SELECT * FROM security_configurations WHERE device_type = 'Firewall' AND security_level > 3;
SELECT id, device_name, last_update FROM security_configurations ORDER BY last_update DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT device_name, AVG(security_level) AS avg_security_level FROM security_configurations GROUP BY device_name HAVING AVG(security_level) > 2;
SELECT * FROM security_configurations WHERE security_level BETWEEN 1 AND 5 ORDER BY security_level ASC, device_name DESC;

SELECT sc.device_name, sc.security_level, as.app_name, as.setting_name FROM security_configurations sc JOIN application_settings as ON sc.device_name = as.app_name WHERE sc.security_level = 4 AND as.app_type = 'Web Application';
SELECT id, device_name, ip_address, port, security_protocol FROM security_configurations;
SELECT * FROM network_devices WHERE is_active = true;
SELECT device_name, location FROM network_devices WHERE device_type = 'router';
SELECT app_name, version, setting_name, setting_value FROM application_settings WHERE app_name = 'App1';
SELECT id, device_name FROM security_configurations ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT * FROM security_configurations WHERE port = 443;
SELECT device_name, ip_address, security_protocol FROM security_configurations WHERE id IN (1, 2, 3);
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_devices FROM network_devices WHERE is_active = TRUE;
SELECT device_name, location, device_type FROM network_devices WHERE is_active = TRUE ORDER BY location ASC;
SELECT app_name, version, setting_name, setting_value FROM application_settings WHERE version LIKE 'v1%';
SELECT * FROM network_devices;
SELECT device_id, device_name, ip_address FROM network_devices ORDER BY device_id DESC;
SELECT device_name, ip_address, status FROM network_devices WHERE status = TRUE;
SELECT * FROM device_settings WHERE device_id = 2;
SELECT app_name, app_type, version FROM applications ORDER BY app_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM network_devices;
SELECT device_name, ip_address, status FROM network_devices WHERE status = TRUE;
SELECT device_name, ip_address FROM network_devices ORDER BY device_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM device_settings JOIN network_devices ON device_settings.device_id = network_devices.device_id;
SELECT app_name, app_type, version FROM applications WHERE version LIKE 'v%' ORDER BY app_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM security_devices;
SELECT device_name, device_type FROM security_devices WHERE device_id = 1;
SELECT device_name, device_ip_address FROM security_devices WHERE device_type = 'Firewall';
SELECT app_name, app_description FROM applications ORDER BY app_name DESC;
SELECT user_id, permission_level FROM user_permissions WHERE app_id = 3 AND device_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM security_devices
SELECT device_name, device_ip_address FROM security_devices
SELECT app_name, app_description FROM applications

SELECT device_name, app_name, permission_level FROM security_devices JOIN user_permissions ON security_devices.device_id = user_permissions.device_id JOIN applications ON user_permissions.app_id = applications.app_id

SELECT device_name, app_name, app_description, setting_name, setting_value FROM security_devices JOIN user_permissions ON security_devices.device_id = user_permissions.device_id JOIN applications ON user_permissions.app_id = applications.app_id JOIN app_settings ON applications.app_id = app_settings.app_id
